author: Simon Difford
description: The traditional aniseed and liquorice French caf√© drink with a sweet hint of fruit.
name: Tomate

recipeInstructions.text: POUR pastis and grenadine into glass
SERVE iced water separately in a small jug (known in France as a 'broc') so the customer can dilute to their own taste (I recommend five shots)
Lastly add ice to fill glass
